data.name: Eternal Dreamers - ShirA.I., the Newscaster
data.detailed_description:
Celebrating 10.000 players with the release of a special character!

Your lovable newscaster, ShirA.I., offers her steady support! Her mission to deliver news to all of humanity won’t be endangered by the Sudden Coma Phenomenon! Be it weather reports, happy talk or breaking news! ShirA.I. can do it all!

*ShirA.I. can be recruited by talking to her in the Medical Bay.

data.short_description: Your lovable newscaster, ShirA.I., offers her steady support to celebrate over 10000 players! Her mission to deliver news to all of humanity won’t be endangered by the Sudden Coma Phenomenon! *ShirA.I. can be recruited by talking to her in the Medical Bay.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual-Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything w/ OpenGL support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
